document_data.name: ''Blade Dlardrageth''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Blade Dlardrageth''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[broadsword]] wielded by [[Xhalph Dlardrageth]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Blade Dlardrageth'' possessed a powerful ''+2'' enchantment that made its blade more deadly and guided the weapons towards its target. It was also a ''[[giant slayer]]'' â€“ a weapons particularly destructive to true [[giant]]s and [[giant-kin]] such as [[troll]]s, [[ogre]]s, [[ogre magi]], [[titan]]s, [[ettin]]s, and the giants of [[Zakhara]]. The same enchantment also could knock a giant down on a successful slash. Lately, the ''Blade Dlardrageth'' greatly boosted the wielder's physical strength.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the ''Blade Dlardrageth'' was still in Xhalph Dlardrageth's hands within the dreaded [[Hellgate Keep]], where the sword was used to gleefully dice unwitting adventurers.
